Get a list of Chemical Categories

get.categories.Rd

Creates a list of chemical categories included in the database. Note this is not comprehensive.

get.categories(ver = "upd")

Arguments

ver

Version of the database. Default is upd, for the latest version.

Value

A data frame containing the categories for all chemicals included the database.

Examples

get.categories()

#>             Category
#> 1                DDT
#> 2                PAH
#> 5         Haloalkane
#> 7                HCH
#> 8              Ether
#> 9            Alcohol
